snippet: The trial of two allies of the New York City comptroller, John C. Liu, was postponed after Xing Wu Pan was hospitalized “with a mental health condition.”
abstract: Trial of Jia Hou and  Xing Wu Pan, allies of New York City comptroller John C Liu who are charged in illegal campaign-finance scheme, is delayed after Pan is involuntarily committed and hospitalized for a mental health condition.
lead_paragraph: The trial of two allies of the New York City comptroller, John C. Liu, was postponed after Xing Wu Pan was hospitalized “with a mental health condition.”

headline.seo: Liu Fund-Raiser Hospitalized and Trial Postponed
headline.main: Hospitalization Delays Trial of Liu Fund-Raiser
headline.print_headline: Hospitalization Delays Trial of Liu Fund-Raiser
